title: Solar for Watchmaker
summary: Solar Android Wear App for Watchmaker
description: ---In order to use this watch face you need to download the WatchMaker app http://goo.gl/FMxUfY ---This is Solar, the watch face with an animated sun that follows the actual sun. If you haven't yet, check out the video to see it in action. A pretty minimalistic analog watch face, except for this big shiny thing that rotates around the clock.I have just opened a Google+ Community to keep requests and announce updates https://plus.google.com/communities/112022173782155443744
descriptionHTML:
---In order to use this watch face you need to download the WatchMaker app http://goo.gl/FMxUfY ---

This is Solar, the watch face with an animated sun that follows the actual sun. If you haven't yet, check out the video to see it in action. A pretty minimalistic analog watch face, except for this big shiny thing that rotates around the clock.

I have just opened a Google+ Community to keep requests and announce updates https://plus.google.com/communities/112022173782155443744
